title: Looking for Player to Party with on Bonus IP Weeken (300% IP for 5 player teams)
body:
Looking for players to join me for that IP boost this weekend. I'm available the whole weekend to smash out many many games. I've got all forms of voice communication, play to win and just generally chill. 

 I'm a low plat player on a new account, but don't worry about that. I'm running exp/ip boosts and have got the champs/runes I need to win games (we'll probably even get matched against lower rated opponents).  Add in client-cheers.
